title: Why are diamonds and golds in bronze 4??
body:
Sighhh another game of my team 5 bronze 4/5s vs a team with season 5 golds and diamonds
http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/119429537/201116870/eog

replies.body:
I assume it has something to do with the dynamic queue? Maybe a Bronze enemy is queueing with their Diamond buddies and getting boosted. PhyLoL and many other pros/streamers/YouTubers have expressed concern that this will happen very often.
It's a load of crap IMHO, really poor decision by Riot, but there's nothing that can be done to stop it from happening now.
I believe (don't quote me) that Riot are releasing a Solo ONLY ranked system in the next couple weeks, with a completely separate rank ladder to the dynamic queue, unless what PhyLoL has been saying is a troll. But I believe there was an official Rito post.
